refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns an array of default properties of the class

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function will return an associative array of default properties of the class. The resulting array elements are in the form of varname => value.

note.para: Prior to PHP 4.2.0, Uninitialized class variables will not be reported by get_class_vars.

example.title: get_class_vars example
example.programlisting:
<?php

class myclass {

    var $var1; // this has no default value...
    var $var2 = "xyz";
    var $var3 = 100;
    
    // constructor
    function myclass() {
        return(TRUE);
    }

}

$my_class = new myclass();

$class_vars = get_class_vars(get_class($my_class));

foreach ($class_vars as $name => $value) {
    echo "$name : $value\n";
}

?>
